import React from 'react'; import { Link, Element, Events, animateScroll as scroll, scrollSpy } from 'react-scroll'; import './Services.css'; const Services = () => { const scrollToNextSection = () => { scroll.scrollTo(700); // Adjust the value based on your content height }; return (

Services

{/* Full Services Section */}

Full Services

Your Home Deserves the Best

{/* Service Type 1 */}

Kitchen

Our kitchen cleaning services include thorough cleaning of countertops, appliances, and more to ensure a pristine and hygienic kitchen.

{/* Service Type 2 */}

Bathroom

Our bathroom cleaning services cover everything from tiles and fixtures to mirrors and surfaces, leaving your bathrooms sparkling clean.

{/* Service Type 3 */}

Whole House

Our whole-house cleaning services ensure every corner of your home is spotless, creating a clean and comfortable living environment.

{/* Special Requests Section */}

Special Requests and One-Time Services

In addition to our full services, we offer special requests and one-time services to meet your unique needs. This includes move-in and move-out cleanings, garbage and organization services, and add-on services like carpet cleanings, refrigerator, and inside the oven cleaning.

); }; export default Services;
